Title: Enemies
Plot: Faith's new alliance with the Mayor goes as far as them conspiring to rob Angel of his soul. Faith tries to seduce him but he is thinking Buffy Summers in a big, one-track way. When the old-fashioned way doesn't work, the Mayor summons a powerful sorcerer who does the job for them. GuestStars: Gary Bullock, Michael Manasseri, Kristine Sutherland, Harry Groener, Alexis Denisof, Eliza Dushku
